breathGuide.title: Breathing Guide
breathGuide.description: Follow the animation to breathe and relax your mind.

tips.title: Start Breathing
description: Press the ▶️ button to begin breathing. Watch the animation and slowly inhale and exhale.

tips.title: Change Settings
description: Press the ⚙️ button to choose your breathing duration and animation type. Find the rhythm that suits you best.

tips.title: Animation Types
description: • Pulse: Inhale as the pulse expands, hold your breath while it remains large, and exhale as it contracts.
• Wave: Inhale as the wave rises, hold your breath at its peak, and exhale as it falls.

randomPicker.title: Random Picker
randomPicker.description: Select one item at random from your list.

input.titleGuide: Enter a title for your random picker.
input.countGuide: Enter the number of items to pick.
input.countError: The number of picks must be less than the total number of items.

multiRandomPicker.title: Multi Random Picker
multiRandomPicker.description: Select multiple items at random from your list.

pomodoroTimer.title: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoroTimer.description: A Pomodoro timer for study and work focus.

10Block.title: 10 Block
10Block.description: An addictive puzzle game where you drag number blocks to make a sum of 10.
10Block.howTo: Drag the blocks to make a total of 10.

slidingPuzzle.title: Sliding Puzzle
slidingPuzzle.description: A classic game where you move tiles to restore the correct order.
slidingPuzzle.howTo: Click on a tile or use the arrow keys to solve the puzzle.
